data.title: Aces, warriors & wingmen: firsthand accounts of Canada's fighter pilots in the Second World War 9780470835906, 0470835907, 1811811841, 9780470158142, 047015814X
data.meta_description: A celebration and a tribute to the warriors of the air who as young men served their country with unselfish devotion. He...
